name: Falling Foul
description:
My utterly unfinished, bit-off-more-than-I-could-chew entry to the ScoreSpace 'Falling' Jam (2022)

Enter your name then press SPACE to start.

Controls are A, D for left and right and W to jump.

Score by 'potting' balls off the side of the screen.

Lose by letting a ball fall to the (bottom) floor.

Game was made in an afternoon, pretty much. It uses LootLocker for the leaderboard.
